已推文

大部份 #PrayForHongKong 暫時都係推關於元朗，記住用英文（中文會吸啲三毛過嚟），除咗講自己感覺之外，亦都可以簡短介紹返件事，因為外國人未必知：

- 元朗班乘客係好無辜，呢個係隨機嘅攻擊 Mob attacked metro passengers, men and women, child and elderly, at random in Yuen Long
- 由於白衫人手持國旗，懷疑政權所發動之恐怖襲擊 —> 中共粗暴干預香港內政，違反50年不變承諾 Mob held Chinese flags, suspected state-sponsored terrorist attack on the protestors and Hongkongers in general. China violated its promise to keep Hong Kong autonomous until 2047.
- 香港警察不聞不問 Hong Kong police arrived at the scene much later than their service mandate, and provided no help to the citizens.

建議巴絲們可以推埋上環：
- 警方喺無預警下連開 36 槍，嚴重違反人權，部份更對準頭開，示威者血流如注，生死未卜 Hong Kong police shot at least 36 rubber bullets at the retreating protestors without any prior warning. Some protestors suffered from life threatening injuries. The police severely violated international human rights standards.
- 香港示威者普遍都係和平，並沒有好似政府所講嘅暴動，但係換來警方粗暴對待 Protestors in Hong Kong were largely peaceful, unlike what the government suggested as a “riot”, yet the police used excessive force on the protestors.

歡迎指正以上中英文內容。

#PrayForHongKong 推爆 Twitter！

- 元朗班乘客係好無辜，呢個係隨機嘅攻擊 Mob attacked metro passengers, men and women, child and elderly, at random in Yuen Long
- 由於白衫人手持國旗，懷疑政權所發動之恐怖襲擊 —> 中共粗暴干預香港內政，違反50年不變承諾 Mob held Chinese flags, suspected state-sponsored terrorist attack on the protestors and Hongkongers in general. China violated its promise to keep Hong Kong autonomous until 2047.
- 香港警察不聞不問 Hong Kong police arrived at the scene much later than their service mandate, and provided no help to the citizens.

建議巴絲們可以推埋上環：
- 警方喺無預警下連開 36 槍，嚴重違反人權，部份更對準頭開，示威者血流如注，生死未卜 Hong Kong police shot at least 36 rubber bullets at the retreating protestors without any prior warning. Some protestors suffered from life threatening injuries. The police severely violated international human rights standards.
- 香港示威者普遍都係和平，並沒有好似政府所講嘅暴動，但係換來警方粗暴對待 Protestors in Hong Kong were largely peaceful, unlike what the government suggested as a “riot”, yet the police used excessive force on the protestors.

歡迎指正以上中英文內容。

- 香港警察不聞不問 Hong Kong police arrived at the scene much later than their service mandate, and provided no help to the citizens.

建議巴絲們可以推埋上環：
- 警方喺無預警下連開 36 槍，嚴重違反人權，部份更對準頭開，示威者血流如注，生死未卜 Hong Kong police shot at least 36 rubber bullets at the retreating protestors without any prior warning. Some protestors suffered from life threatening injuries. The police severely violated international human rights standards.
- 香港示威者普遍都係和平，並沒有好似政府所講嘅暴動，但係換來警方粗暴對待 Protestors in Hong Kong were largely peaceful, unlike what the government suggested as a “riot”, yet the police used excessive force on the protestors.
